title: Economist Philip Jefferson in His Own Words
sub_head: One of Biden’s picks for the Federal Reserve’s board has focused on monetary policy and poverty issues
body:
President Bidenhas nominatedPhilip Jefferson, the vice president for academic affairs and dean of faculty at Davidson College, to serve as a Federal Reserve Board governor. Previously an economics professor at Swarthmore College and an economist at the Fed, Mr. Jefferson’s academic work has focused on monetary policy, poverty and inequality.
Here are some samples of his views.
